page.title: 09FARMER'S DAY IN TYWARDREATH
page.content: My Dad is a{dairy farmer.}First of all he has to get up at 6a.m. and goes out to get the cows from the field where they have been eating grass. Dad and Rob the collie dog drive them to the yard. Dad closes the gate on them and they stay there while Dad is getting hot water. When he comes back he goes in the{milking parlour}and turns on the machines. He lets the cows in three at a time and starts milking. He washes their teats in hot water then some special stuff that takes away the germs. After he has milked them he lets them out in the waiting place where there is grass for them to eat. After he has done them all he takes them to a field until it is milking time again.
